alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 7:08PM CDT until June 05 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR FRONTIER COUNTY... At 707 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Moorefield to 9 miles southwest of Stockville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Eustis, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Orafino, Freedom and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 37 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
